blogPost.excerpt: - FIFO queue to automate Github CI/CD workflows - 3 mins quick setup - Avoid conflicts and keep builds green - Keep Pull Requests up to date with the base branches - Automatically dequeue failed builds
blogPost.body: - FIFO queue to automate Github CI/CD workflows - 3 mins quick setup - Avoid conflicts and keep builds green - Keep Pull Requests up to date with the base branches - Automatically dequeue failed builds
blogPost.title: MergeQueue - Automate Github’s CI/CD in under 3 mins
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: - FIFO队列使Github的CI/CD工作流程自动化 - 3分钟快速设置 - 避免冲突并保持绿色构建 - 保持Pull请求与基础分支的更新 - 自动取消失败构建的queue。
localize.tagline: 在3分钟内自动完成Github的CI/CD工作。

localize.description: - FIFO隊列使Github的CI/CD工作流程自動化 - 3分鐘快速設置 - 避免衝突並保持綠色構建 - 保持Pull請求與基礎分支的更新 - 自動取消失敗構建的queue。
localize.tagline: 在3分鐘內自動完成Github的CI/CD工作。

previous.excerpt: Wavvy is a podcast hosting and analytics platform that is free and open source. Get an RSS feed for iTunes/Spotify, an embeddable audio player, basic analytics, and a customizable one page website. code: https://github.com/toshvelaga/wavvy-clean
previous.title: Wavvy - Podcast hosting and analytics

localize.description: Wavvy是一个免费和开源的播客托管和分析平台。获得一个iTunes/Spotify的RSS源，一个可嵌入的音频播放器，基本的分析，以及一个可定制的单页网站。代码：https://github.com/toshvelaga/wavvy-clean。
Wavvy是一個免費和開源的播客託管和分析平臺。獲得一個iTunes/Spotify的RSS源，一個可嵌入的音頻播放器，基本的分析，以及一個可定製的單頁網站。代碼：https://github.com/toshvelaga/wavvy-clean。

next.excerpt: Infracost is an open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests. When you change your infrastructure code (Terraform), we post a comment in the pull request, telling you the impact to your cloud bill, e.g. “this will increase your bill by 25% next month”.
next.title: Infracost - Open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests

localize.description: Infracost是一个开源的云成本估算器，在拉取请求中。当你更改基础设施代码（Terraform）时，我们会在拉取请求中发布一条评论，告诉你对云计算账单的影响，例如 "这将使你下个月的账单增加25%"。
localize.tagline: 拉请求中的开源云成本估算器

localize.description: Infracost是一個開源的雲成本估算器，在拉取請求中。當你更改基礎設施代碼（Terraform）時，我們會在拉取請求中發佈一條評論，告訴你對雲計算賬單的影響，例如 "這將使你下個月的賬單增加25%"。
localize.tagline: 拉請求中的開源雲成本估算器
